content: Hi all, I'm glad to be here! I signed up for Zulip because I want to help out however I can with this working group, but more proximately because I wanted to let somebody know that the March 2nd meeting invite has the year 2020 in the .ics file.
It's linked from https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2020/02/27/ffi-unwind-design-meeting.html and it might be good, when fixing the calendar event, to also mention the fix on the blog post.
I'm sorry, that was a one-time meeting that did in fact occur in March of 2020! If you'd like to join our bi-weekly sync-ups, they're hosted here on Zulip every other Thursday.
Oh! I see. Yes I'd enjoy that, thanks :)

@Irene Knapp here is the calendar link for the meeting; I believe you can also add yourself to the @WG-ffi-unwind group if you'd like a notification here when we meet.

To catch you up with the current status:

  • The actual C-unwind RFC has been merged: https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/2945

• The implementation PR is close: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/76570
  • We are now looking into how longjmp and pthread_cancel support can be codified. Here is our latest blog post: https://blog.rust-lang.org/inside-rust/2021/01/26/ffi-unwind-longjmp.html
